General.Name: Apogee Optocom Co Ltd
General.Description: Apogee Optocom Co., Ltd. manufactures, processes, sells, trades in, and operates DWDM interference filters. It also offers optical communication ceramic ferrules and coated optical components; active and passive optical filters; wired and wireless communication equipment; data center products; 3D sensing, fluorescent, fiber laser, linear, notch, and tap + edge filters; and absorption films. It also offers measurement services, including white light interferometer, spectrophotometer, fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy, and thin film analyzer; and OEM and ODM coating services, such as LED DBR and OSR, far infrared, index match ITO, metal, and UV range filter coating. Apogee Optocom Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.7, Nan-Ke 3rd Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 744
